author: Sam Prell
title: Play this mini-game while you wait for the Ghost Recon: Wildlands beta and earn some rewards | GamesRadar+
text:
News Shares 
A reminder for all you would-be special forces and military tacticians, the Ghost Recon: Wildlands open beta starts tomorrow. But if you're really eager to jump into an open world of cartel smashing, you can get a head start and download it now. And if you really can't wait, Ubisoft has released a little mini-game to keep you busy. 
A World With No Heroes is a map-based game you play in your browser. Using security cameras, you can explore the world of Wildlands, seeking out specific targets. It's not just for fun or time-killing - by playing this mini-game, you'll unlock rewards like XP boosts and emblems in the full game. 
For more info on what's in the Ghost Recon: Wildlands beta and how to get in , go ahead and click on that link. 
Seen something newsworthy? !
